short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes all package install textboxes to installation buttons on chocolatey.org/packages and utilizes bcurran3's protocol handler.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just search for your package as usual, but no need to copy the command line - just press install right next to it.

You can install multiple packages at the same time, the preinstaller extension runs them one after another.
